## Task.offset property

A [duration](https://docs.influxdata.com/flux/v0.x/spec/lexical-elements/#duration-literals) to delay execution of the task after the scheduled time has elapsed. `0` removes the offset.

**Signature:**

```typescript
offset?: string;
```
